player_news.trend_summary: In the Spanish Super Cup, Jude Bellingham opened the scoring for Real Madrid against Mallorca, earning the team a victory that sets up a Superclasico clash with Barcelona. The 19-year-old midfielder's performance has drawn comparisons to David Beckham, as he becomes the latest in a line of iconic players to grace the cover of adidas football boots.

player_news.trend_summary: Rodrygo starred for Real Madrid in their 3-0 victory over Mallorca, scoring a goal and assisting Jude Bellingham in the other two. The win secured Real Madrid's place in the Supercopa de España final, where they will face arch-rivals Barcelona.

player_news.trend_summary: Pablo Maffeo, who has recently been praised by Lionel Messi as the "toughest defender" he has faced, was involved in a heated on-field incident with Real Madrid's Jude Bellingham during the Spanish Supercopa clash, where Bellingham allegedly touched Maffeo's head, leading to a verbal altercation between Maffeo and Marco Asensio. Additionally, Maffeo has made headlines for his bold claim that he would knock out Vinicius Jr. in a boxing match, following his impressive performance against the Real Madrid star in the Supercopa match.

player_news.player_name: Vinícius José Paixão de Oliveira Júnior
player_news.trend_summary: Real Madrid star Vinicius Junior faces transfer speculation ahead of a potential Saudi Arabian mega-deal, despite his suspension not affecting his availability for the Spanish Super Cup semi-final against Mallorca. The Brazilian winger has set a date for contract talks with Real Madrid amid growing optimism from Saudi Arabia about his potential departure.
